Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 54th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2019...
Injured on 4/7/2019 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/2019 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/12/2019 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/2020 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: P Marcelo Guzman, P Celso Resto, P Imotoku Kyoden. Going to BRO: P Fernando Cantu)...
Injured on 8/4/2021 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/4/2022...
Had first career hit on 4/13/2022, off Willie Wright (HOU)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 7/30/2022 (Going to PHI: P Marcelo Guzman. Going to CIN: P Peter Blind, P Francisco Cordero Jr., RF Troy Burrier)...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2023, winning 2 games with a 1.20 ERA...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
